website_summaries.verdict: This durable, convenient container doesn't leak when shaken and is good for making homemade vinaigrettes.
pros: One-handed open/close lever flips back to pour and forward to seal
Markings displayed in cups, milliliters, and ounces
cons: Not as good with thick, creamy dressings, but better with thinner dressings and vinaigrettes

customer_reviews.title: The description says it is dishwasher safe but the plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: The description says it is dishwasher safe but the plastic valve has already shown signs of melting and no longer creates an airtight seal. If you do buy this wash by hand. I called amazon and they sent a replacement with no issues. I would recommend just washing it by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Terence

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it already, it is what you need.
customer_reviews.text: If you need one of these, and you do need one, buy it. I wanted a dressing shaker for a long time, but thought it was stupid to pay when I could just stir the dressing in a mason jar, which was messy and less effective. Finally broke down and bought this and am mad at myself for not buying one sooner. Works great, less mess.
customer_reviews.author: Max B.

customer_reviews.title: ... the dishwasher so thought a 2nd one might be good and decided to go with the smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I already had the larger size but find that I am frequently retrieving that one from the dishwasher so thought a 2nd one might be good and decided to go with the smaller size. I used it several times the first week - capacity is about a cup so works great when you have a smaller amount. I don’t use it for salad dressing but rather for mixing eggs or when making a thickening agent to add to broth or soup...
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Good for thin dressings, not for creamier ones
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because it's a well-made product that I bet would work well for thin, liquid-y dressings... but I got it hoping it would work for my creamy dill dressing (which isn't particularly thick), and it doesn't. The spout area gets kind of gross every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina W

customer_reviews.title: perfect little salad dressing shaker
customer_reviews.text: The little shaker has been perfect for making homemade salad dressing. The first salad dressing container I bought was basically just a glass bottle with screw on lid. I didn't understand the need for shaking at first or the convenience the top opening would provide, but this is great. It is small, so might not work for a big family or dinner party, but for just two of us, it works great. It has survived the top shelf of our dishwasher with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rick

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy that store bought crap salad dressing
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy that store bought crap salad dressing. Take some olive oil, add a little spicy mustard, couple drops of balsamic, and some salt and pepper and shake it up in this bad boy.
customer_reviews.author: CRB

customer_reviews.title: Product Sticker Sucks
customer_reviews.text: I'LL NEVER UNDERSTAND WHY MANUFACTURERS MAKE A QUALITY PRODUCT..ONLY TO PLACE A CHEAP GORILLA GLUED PRODUCT STICKER ON IT..VERY HARD TO REMOVE..DESPITE ALL OF THE REMOVAL TIPS U TRY..AND BY THE TIME U FINALLY GET IT OFF - U R BEYOND PISSED!!! STOP DOING THIS!
customer_reviews.author: BDS

customer_reviews.title: Handy Salad Dressing Shakers !
customer_reviews.text: I like to make my own salad dressing and these little salad dressing shakers are the perfect size for small batches. I use fresh ingredients in my dressing so the small containers are perfect--I use up the dressing before the ingredients spoil. This is my second order of these shakers and I could not be more pleased. I also like the top seal which is air tight. The main portion screws onto the cap. It is easily cleaned and I feel very comfortable in having these on my dinner table for family or guests!
customer_reviews.author: annika700

customer_reviews.title: These shakers are awesome. I got a large initially and liked it ...
customer_reviews.text: These shakers are awesome. I got a large initially and liked it so much I got a small as well. I make a honey mustard vinaigrette and it's a little thick, but it comes out of the shaker fine. I also started making creamer and the large one is perfect for that, and I use the small for salad dressing. There is a little residue left on the lip after pouring, but I just wipe it off with a kitchen towel and it's fine. For the most part I eyeball recipes, but the measurements are nice to have. I also like that it's easy to screw on and does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: dirty mouth
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, it's no leaking, but the problem is no cover on it. After you pour your salad dressing, the dressing left on the pouring mouth and no cover for it. It looks so messy and dirty. It's sad about this wrong design. Other than I can use all the dressing at once and totally clean it after, I am not able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: JYL

customer_reviews.title: Works great to hold liquids
customer_reviews.text: Such a simple household item, but I absolutely love it. My mom is disabled and likes to put coffee in her milk. We only ever buy the gallon of milk which is too heavy for her to hold when it's full so I bought this to use as her milk poorer. It has worked out great. It's lightweight and holds enough milk for the week for her coffee and the little spout is easy enough for her to open and close to poor her milk.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Works great but can be hard to clean creamy dressings
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this product was designed for oil based dressings however I have been using it for a creamy dressing. It pours fine, however, it develops a gross crust around the stopper over time and the part where the stopper pivots on the bottom are difficult to clean. Dressing manages to get in there and it's hard to get even the bristles of a brush in there to clean it. But, other than that I do love this product and its easy to pour sprout.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: I do love that the containers aren't in a funky shape so ...
customer_reviews.text: I now have four of these salad dressing containers. We eat a lot of salad in my house and typically don't use store bought dressing, so I use these to store my homemade dressings and since I have a few I am able to make a variety of dressings. The one downside is that there is sometimes buildup on the spout, which can at times be a pain to wash, so I will soak the tops sometimes prior to washing. I do love that the containers aren't in a funky shape so the base isn't difficult to wash like some other dressing containers I owned. Other than that, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Searoses

customer_reviews.title: gross top!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I am not using this correctly, but the dressing gets stuck at the top (on the outside) and looks really gross! I have to clean it constantly. The shaker parts works great, but the pouring part just makes a big mess!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good function, messy spout
customer_reviews.text: This is a clever little dressing holder. I purchased it for the convienence of the measuring lines, shaker, pourer, and sealing all in one. My problem is the mess that stays in the dispenser. You tip the top and pour the dressing out but then the spout stays covered with dressing. You can easily seal the bottle back up and the seal is good but everything’s in the spout and seal is dripping in dressings. This is especially gross with a creamy dressing (I made a ranch). I love the function but the covienence is leased when I need to deep clean the spout with every use.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size!
customer_reviews.text: Oxo is a brand that I rely on in my home, and their products are good quality. I bought this one cup salad dressing shaker, and it is really the perfect size for making homemade, fresh salad dressing. It has a nice, wide opening to add your ingredients, seals tightly, dispenses smoothly, and is very easy to clean. What more do you need? It is perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: B.girl

customer_reviews.title: Salad Dressing Galore
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a couple salad dressing containers prior to this one. The size is perfect for mixing just enough dressing. It's easy to mix the dressing because the top comes off easily. Measurements are on the side of the shaker to make measuring out ingredients even easier. The top plug is tight enough that I can shake the bottle vigorously without any leakage. But it is important to wash this by hand, as other reviews indicate, although it says dishwasher safe, the rubber has a tendency to melt in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I recently found a store that sells flavored balsamic vinegars and olive oils. So now I am obsessed with mixing up delicious vinaigrettes for salads. I usually only need to create a small amount of vinaigrette so this size bottle was perfect. It's enough to dress a small to large salad with leaving room to shake it. Nothing spills out when you have the top closed. And I was able to easily hand wash it without leaving an oil residue in it. It is dishwasher safe but I also wanted to test out the handwashing aspect. I've already used this three times in just the one week that I've had it.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Solid but slightly imperfect addition to my kitchen collection
customer_reviews.text: What I like: I like the looks of it, I like the wider, shorter body, and it is super easy to clean in the dishwasher. What makes it 4- and not 5-stars? I should have realized this from simply looking at the picture, but when you've poured the dressing out and flip the cap back in place, there's a decent bit of spout on the outside of the sealed portion. Long story short, there's always a bit of dressing above the seal. I don't like the look of it and it bothers me a little bit from a sanitary perspective. That said, I do generally like it and I already have it, so I'm going to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny K

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I love this little dressing shaker. It is just the right size for a small family. I find that most homemade dressing doesn't really keep more than a couple of days, so I never want to make a large amount. This little 1 cup size is just right for a few days worth of dressing. It seals very well and does a great job when you shake it to mix the dressing. Cleans up well in the dishwasher and easy to pour from, not much else it could do except make the dressing itself.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Quick & Easy way to make your own salad dressing
customer_reviews.text: I saw this reviewed on America's Test Kitchen and had finally given up on the salad shaker I had been using because it didn't spin right and was a pain to clean. This one works so much better. It's very easy to clean, doesn't leak, and quickly does the job of mixing the ingredients with a few shakes. I'm happy to see that as with most Oxo products, it's made well. The plastic is fairly thick and it feels like it should last well.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Improve your salad game!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this thing. Make your salad dressing in a jar, and then pour easily with one hand, without dealing with a messy lid situation and before the dressing separates. I used to always make dressing in jars (and had these problems). Now my dressing woes are over. And it doesn't drip down the side either! Got my first one at Sur le Table, replaced because the spout hinge broke. So I guess that's a con for durability... but I won't dock a star, because this thing has seriously improved my salad game.
customer_reviews.author: D in Oakland

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the $$
customer_reviews.text: I usually use a mason jar for my salad dressings, but sometimes you want something a little bit nicer for your homemade dressings. This is great for my everyday dressings and the size is great so that I don't have too much of a certain dressing. This is easy to clean and very sturdy. The pour spout works great and seals the dressing in so it doesn't leak when shaking bottle. Only issue, is I wish I purchased the larger size as well
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: stopper gets coated with dressing when you pour
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size for mixing a reasonable amount of dressing (that you can use before it goes bad), but the stopper swivels, which means that as you pour, the dressing comes over the top and the stopper get covered with dressing. I was thinking the spout was a good feature, but the dressing covers it (naturally) but when you close the stopper, the coated spout is outside the closed area. Looked at other products that had an agitator inside and those one didn't have it. Didn't say it had one, but it would be nicer if it did.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cilia

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been? Love, love, love.
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine ever going back to bottled salad dressing after making my own for the past several years. I was used to the challenges (and failures) of using my plastic containers, but didn't know about this little gem. Came across it while browsing our local department store's kitchen department. Bought one for myself and another as a gift. Have purchased several more since then. This invention is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Tight seal, good size
customer_reviews.text: My main concern was whether it would have a tight seal. Other reviews said it has a good seal and they're right. I read a review that said they ruined the seal by running it thru their dishwasher. I am washing mine by hand and it has continued to seal tightly. It holds enough dressing for the largest salad I've ever made (9 guests) and I like that it is portable so I can take a salad to a pot luck and dress it there. So 3 stars for easy to clean, but 5 stars everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: R. Herman

customer_reviews.title: ENJOY YOUR SALAD DRESSINGS
customer_reviews.text: A nice looking salad dressing dispenser. It doesn't take up a lot space, especially if you have a small matchbook kitchen and limited space. Nice color and it doesn't look cheap. So ENJOY all those dressing you'll certainly want to make.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this handy salad dressing container!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the bees knees! I've been making my own dressings for years - its so easy and you don't have to ingest any unnecessary chemicals, additives, preservatives, sugar, etc. You can measure right in the cup, seal it up, shake away then serve right from the container. It seals shut nicely to store in the fridge all in one container. Before I'd mix in the glass measuring cup, use an aerolatte to mix it up, then pour to another container to store. It's nice to do all in one container.
customer_reviews.author: CABella

customer_reviews.title: It! Leaks when you pour the dressing
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size bottle, but when you pour the dressing, the dressing cames out from both sizes of the tip and it gets super messy.
customer_reviews.author: Cockatiel

customer_reviews.title: Spout stays full of dressing after closing top
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this shaker EXCEPT the fact that the spout stays full of dressing after it is closed and has to be cleaned out before storing - especially if the dressing is a thick one. Shakers with a cap or top don't require extra cleaning after each use. I wish I had realized this before purchasing it, because I likely would have purchased something different, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Livable

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT MICROWAVE; otherwise handy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: After mixing some vinaigrette, I refrigerated it. When I intended to use it, I placed the shaker in the microwave for less than a minute to liquefy the congealed olive oil. That melted the plastic at the hinge, because the hinge contained metal (it's not obvious). In the Q&A for this product someone wrote about the same thing. I ordered a replacement and will remove the top of the shaker before using the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Aleph

customer_reviews.title: Handy Dandy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this OXO Good Grips Salad Dressing Shaker because it had so many happy Amazon reviews. It lives up to its reputation. I bought the larger size, and it has quickly become one of my favorite kitchen gadgets. Easy to use, easy to serve, easy to store, easy to clean. This shaker has made it so simple to make salad dressings that I'm going to order more, so I can have several recipes on hand at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: bjj

customer_reviews.title: Useful gadget, but for informal dining
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what I wanted, namely, I can put in the oil, vinegar etc. and put it on the table. During the meal, of course the salad dressing separates somewhat, and each person can shake it up before using. It looks pretty and has fared well in my dishwasher. The lucite hasn't scratched at all in the months since I bought it. I gave it only 4 stars because it does drip a bit from the spout as you pour out the dressing, so the shaker is usually a bit greasy. It wouldn't be so great for a fancy dinner. It doesn't leak when you shake it, though, unless you forget to push the lid closed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schechter

customer_reviews.title: Works great with two hands too
customer_reviews.text: My hands are not large enough to pull the stopper open with one finger, but it's very easy to shake, then flip the stopper open with my other hand, and pour. It pours cleanly, no drips, and the flip top pushes closed tightly. The measurement markings are pretty exact, and I've not experienced any leaks, even with vigorous shaking. For cleaning, the stop unscrews for easy wide-mouth washing. All in all, a great design!
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw with the stopper but otherwise good product
customer_reviews.text: Took a star off because the stopper does not always close securely, especially if you’ve just poured dressing out (oil collects at the top and prevents the seal from securing). However, it’s easy to make dressing in this and washes nicely in the dishwasher top rack. Great product for those who like making their own salad dressing despite the design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: cke

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little cup!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size cup to make dressing for a family salad, or a 1-2 person large salad, with leftovers. It's sturdy enough that Im not worried about it slipping out of my hands and spilling all over. And yet it comes apart for cleaning with a little bit extra effort. My husband is excited about coming up with new salad dressing recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Serene Gagniuk

customer_reviews.title: Love the smaller size version
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for most home made dressing recipes. I prefer making my own salad dressing but the "shelf life" is shorter so I cut the recipe in half to avoid waste. I often have 5 or more different bottles of salad dressing in my fridge at any given time so this bottle is the perfect size to maximize space. I love the attached cap the opens easily with one finger.
customer_reviews.author: M. DeLaCerda

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after washed in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine until I ran it through my dishwasher (in the top shelf) several times. Now it leaks unless I hold the top lever down while I shake it. Ignore the "dishwasher safe" labeling and hand wash only if you don't want leakage.
customer_reviews.author: pmilli

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these in different colors so we could distinguish between salad dressings and found them to be far better quality than expected for the price. easy to use, easy to clean, the measurements embossed on the body make it easy to mix our dressings. In addition, the shorter overall height makes them easy to store in the fridge on those 'often too short' shelves on the door. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: WK

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but seriously flawed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shaker a few weeks ago. After 3 or 4 uses the spout no longer seals. Even tried holding it closed with my finger and it leaks when I shake the dressing. And I won't store unused dressing in an open container. Save your money. Looks nice but poorly designed. I've gone back to the Good Seasons bottle you get free with a package of salad dressing. P.S. I did not put it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design
customer_reviews.text: Major design flaw: dressing flows over the lid when you flip it open and pour out. Others here have taken photos of this. I don’t want to clean off the lid every single time I pour dressing. This is going in the trash, and I’m just going to keep dressing in a Mason jar.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Came in quickly with Prime. Good quality product. My husband makes his own dressing and I found this. What a good deal. Works great. See pics
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, no leaks, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Does not leak or spill! It is great for measuring out salad dressings. Also very easy to clean. I purchased the larger size but I think the small size would have been adequate for me (it's just me and one other). The dressings stay good for a while and I have had no problems yet!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R

customer_reviews.title: Solid product: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for mixing up salad dressing or other mixes when you only need a cup or so. We use it for not only dressings but different sauces which are used for recipes ranging from Asian to Italian. The size, along with the markings, are also perfect for experimenting with new dressings, etc.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brook

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST DESIGNED CRUET I HAVE EVER USED!!
customer_reviews.text: I have both a small and a large Oxo Salad Dressing Shaker and love them both, though for everyday use by myself the smaller one get's the most usage. The design is brilliant, and cleaning it is a snap. Also, the one handed operation of opening and closing the pouring spout is genius. And it's very convenient to store leftover dressing right in the container in the refrigerator. I love this! I love the combination of great design and a very effective kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Will be donated to Goodwill
customer_reviews.text: The top leaver needs to be wiped off after every use, or there will be dried, junky salad dressing around it, sometimes acting like a glue.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: No leaks
customer_reviews.text: Oxo products never disappoint and this is one of them. I have a coleslaw oil and vinegar dressing that I like to mix up and triple the ingredients so that I always have some in the fridge. I am able to shake this container without any leaking, the pour spout keeps a great seal.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and cleans up easily
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use make packaged salad dressing. The wide mouth is perfect for adding oil and vinegar. The lip does not drip after pouring. The top closes securely and keep the dressing fresh, and it is very easy to clean by hand. Haven't tried it in the dishwasher yet. Beautiful design and a pleasure to use. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Not for ranch. Poor design. Messy
customer_reviews.text: Leaks everywhere. The lid design is majorly flawed. Seems created to cause a mess. The screw on lid leaks anytime you open it. Do not get to make ranch. Maybe an oil/vinegar type dressing but anything that is thicker.. Forget about it.
customer_reviews.author: Asinine Republic

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but top melted
customer_reviews.text: I loved loved loved this product until the top started melting see pictures. Don’t know if it was from the dishwasher or the microwave. When you make your own dressing you use oil and when kept in the fridge it solidifies. The only way to warm it up is to microwave it for a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Andy T Blood

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I make this recipe every week and take it to our church potluck. I take home a empty bottle. Try this Whole Food Plant Based no salt or oil recipe for "Sweet Fire Dressing" 1/2 cup plain almond milk Dash-1/4 tsp Cayenne pepper 1/4 tsp Smoked paprika 1/4 cup brown mustard or Dijon 1/4 cup maple syrup Just shake the tumbler and you have a yummy dressing. It will hold a double batch of the recipe too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great great great for someone who wants to make their own dressings and know whats in their food.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about this item sooner, worth every penny! Easy to clean, control your ingredients, and save in fridge for the week ahead. Great for busy Mommies!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not good for thick creamy dressing...
customer_reviews.text: The large one was much smaller than I expected so unless you're using one serving you might want to get the larger one. Also it does not work well with really thick creamy dressing like Caesar. I make my own carb-free Caesar dressing and this gets all clogged into the nozzle that you move with your thumb to pour it out. So it's just really messy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay
customer_reviews.text: It's great for mixing up vinaigrettes and being able to re-shake things as you need. The thing I don't love is that once you pour from it, and then tilt it back upright, there's ALWAYS some dressing that drips down the outside of the spout and then creates an oily mess on the outside of the canister. Then you're picking up a greasy mess of a shaker. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: I noticed OXO makes thiss it two sizes, 8 and 16 oz. I have the larger size and it works well for a big group (10-20 people). The smaller would be good for couples or family. It is easy to use - you can hold it and keep your finger down on the spout lid to shake and then open with one finger and pour. It stores the dressing or sauce in the refridgerator well because the spout-lid stays put.-super good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ro C

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect because when closed the bottle is airtight but can ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make salad dressing initially but now I use it to squeeze and store lemon juice for the week that I use in my detox water every morning!! It can store the juice of 6 large lemons with room to spare. Its perfect because when closed the bottle is airtight but can be easily opened just by tilting the top. I have used this for salad dressings as well and it worked great for that too. I wish it was glass as I don't like plastic too much but that's a small hitch since I'm not putting anything hot it in so its okay. The measurement markers are a nice feature. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shiro

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I can mix all my salad dressing ingredients with ease.does not leak, but u must hold the lid closed as u shake so it does not leak or spill all over. This is great to make a dressing for the week. Just shake it up before pouring and u are good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine until the rubber washer came out
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our coffee creamer. We liked it, it was easy to pop into the dishwasher, easy to refill, but then the rubber washer came out and it started leaking EVERYWHERE. Too late to return it, only last about 3 months before the washer came out.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Perfect salad dressing container!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect salad dressing container. I make my own salad dressing, and this container holds just enough. I can shake the container to mix the dressing before use, and serve the dressing from the pour spout without any problem. The container does not leak when the spout is closed. It’s also very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Better than storing dressings in tupperware.
customer_reviews.text: I love to make salad dressings and avoid the extra oils and salts. The bottle seals super well-- so much so that it can be difficult to open sometimes. The pour spout on the top has a rubber border so that you can store and save your creation for longer. :) The only problem is that I have one less excuse to not make salads. Wait, that isn't a problem! oh well.
customer_reviews.author: LilianBear

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was using a mason jar to mix my salad dressing, but it wasn't the neatest thing when it came to pouring dressing on salads. This shaker is the best ever! Doesn't leak, and when you pour the dressing, it doesn't drip. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: kvh

customer_reviews.title: I use it to store chunky sauces
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily for my teriyaki sauce, because it has chunks of garlic, so it didn't work in the old bottle I had before. I like that you can open and close it with a thumb, and that the widest part screws open so you can easily transfer your sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Love these for Super Beets
customer_reviews.text: I use these for Super Beets which make a mess with the fine powder and concentrated coloring. I have 4 and refill it with powder, screw the top on, add water through the opening and close it, shake well, and pour...finally no mess and it mixes thoroughly! I toss in the dishwasher no worries and have been using these for years!
customer_reviews.author: CARRIE BYERS

customer_reviews.title: A must-have tool for your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite kitchen gadgets. Making your own healthy dressings (with no weird artificial additives) has never been easier. The measurement marks are clear and very visible. You just layer your ingredients as needed, put the lid on, hold the spigot tight with your thumb and shake until mixed. Cleanup is super easy. We use it so much I am purchasing a second one so that we can keep different kinds of dressing in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Travels well
customer_reviews.text: I love to make my own dressing, but had a hard time finding one that would travel to work well. I tried a few others previously and this was by far the best! I liked this so much I bought another one to keep at home.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great for dressings.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It is well made and holds 1 and 1/2 cups, which is a nice amount for homemade dressings. It seals well when closed and you just flip the little top back to open. It's easy to clean and looks nice on the table.
customer_reviews.author: cat101

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I first got this in the mail I thought it was going to be way too small for any of my ingredients. However, when I used it for the first time I was blown away. It worked so well and was easy to use! The lid suctioned well so I wasn't worried about spilling. It also does well in the fridge so it can store your dressing for a while. Sometimes the lid does get stuck though so it can be hard to open, but other than that it's been doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not leak!
customer_reviews.text: I got this container to make salad dressing. One I previously purchased did not screw on tight so it started to leak immediately. This one is AMAZING. The connection of the top to the bottom is tight and secure. The level to open and close to pour is a fabulous design. Each time my husband or I use it, we comment how much we love it. I put it in the dishwasher on the top shelf and it gets fully clean. I would HIGHLY recommend this shaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Knotts

customer_reviews.title: Best Salad Dressing Container Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! I make a lot of my own dressings, so I bought two - a small one and a large one. They are sturdy and air tight. I especially like how you can open and close/seal with one hand. Truly a necessity for any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio

customer_reviews.title: Great for homemade dressing!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bottle for my homemade dressing. I bought the smaller size, as we don't use a whole lot of dressing. I just put my ingredients into the bottle and shake. It doesn't leak when shaken or after pouring. The flip lid is very easy to use. Cleans up nicely in the dishwasher. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tuyen N.

customer_reviews.title: always make my dressings in this
customer_reviews.text: with the measurements on the side, i always use this to make my dressings. works well, seals well, pours well. only gripe is cleaning the spout is a little hard but not a big issue. would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jason L

customer_reviews.title: A simple answer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this salad dressing server after doing a lot of research figuring out how to serve the oil type dressings. I have had it now for 3 months or so and cannot find any fault with it. The secret to using it is to shake the dickens out of it just before you use it, then you will always have the same ratio of oil-to-dressing right to the end. But always double check that the top is closed completely BEFORE shaking! It is true that the container may be hard to wash, but that should not stop you from enjoying this product. A good soaking first will make washing it easier.
customer_reviews.author: rog's stuff

customer_reviews.title: More kudos to OXO
customer_reviews.text: OXO does it again with a simple, well designed product. It's a two part canister which you unscrew at the black band to add your dressing ingredients, and there are lines on the side so you can measure as you add. The flip-stopper in the spout gives a tight seal when you want to shake, and the spout doesn't drip. What else to ask? (I have not tried it yet on a creamy dressing, only vinegar and oil based dressings.)
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Okay to a point
customer_reviews.text: The item works as it should, however, the swivel top is very difficult to clean allowing oil to go rancid. This item works much better as a shaker for Martini's keeping ice from falling into your drink.
customer_reviews.author: Sgurgola

customer_reviews.title: I bought two
customer_reviews.text: Great if you make your own dressing. We usually do a lemon vinaigrette and a red wine vinegar and olive oil dressing. Easy to measure, shake to emulsify, flip to pour and easy to wash. Great Oxo product..no surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Foxglove

customer_reviews.title: Best salad dressing dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely my favorite salad dressing dispenser. It's completely leak proof and drip proof. I love that I can mix, serve, and store all in the same container. And it's super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ButterYum

customer_reviews.title: If you eat a lot of salads, you need this!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Makes it easy to portion and not overdress salads. And if someone wants a little extra it is there. I find I am using 1/2 the amount of dressing I was before. and it is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Amato

customer_reviews.title: perfect little dressing container
customer_reviews.text: I think OXO is a great brand and have many of their products. I was looking to start making my own salad dressings and this is a perfect little bottle to use. I don't have any issues shaking the ingredients, but I do keep a finger on the green 'stem' . It's so convenient to make the dressing in the same container you can serve it from. An attractive container which looks good on the table.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for vinaigrette
customer_reviews.text: Makes a nice amount of my favorite oil & vinegar salad dressing (about a cup). Easy fill-up with all ingredients including dry herbs. Seals tight for shaking, does not leak, pours cleanly, re-seals easily, rinses off after use if any drops are left around the top seal. No metal to etch or dissolve in the vinegar's acetic acid. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Neone, PNW

customer_reviews.title: Great for salad dressing
customer_reviews.text: I love this - bought in 2 sizes. I make salad dressing and keep it all week. Remember to hold the top when you shake or it might open slightly and make a mess. Otherwise would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SHEYO

customer_reviews.title: Great helper
customer_reviews.text: This is really a small salad dressing shaker, but its great. You wash it more often, as the capacity is not vast. Works great for one time preparation or for a small household of 2...
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Making our own dressings just got way easier!
customer_reviews.text: We love making our own salad dressings and this shaker makes it so easy! It's very well constructed, seals completely with zero drips while shaking vigorously, and the little spout and the top stays put with a solid seal but is easily opened with one finger when you're ready to pour. Love the measurements along the side too - just makes it all so much easier! Definitely glad we bought this!
customer_reviews.author: S Mobley

customer_reviews.title: You can't do better
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a bunch of glass bottles for salad dressing, mostly vintage due to the classy style. So glad I got this! Breaks in half for easy cleaning, holds tons, super non spill spout. For $15!!! Good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Miller

customer_reviews.title: Leakage
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like that the top does not seal securely; Hate that the bottom threads into the top which causes leakage all down the outside of bottle (from the top) if you decide to open the container to add more or anything to taste (more salt, vinegar, olive oil, red pepper, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: The nice thing about these is they don't drip all over ...
customer_reviews.text: We just started using this and will probably by another 2. It has an O-ring to seal the top spout. If using a creamy or a dressing with gritty spices in it, it will stop the O-ring sealing properly. You can press the handle a bite tighter to the opening and wash out the spout or remove the top and rinse it out. We often need to do the same thing to our other salad dressing carafes. The nice thing about these is they don't drip all over the place. I like to drawn my salad. We are looking at other uses. I have added it to my shopping list for later.
customer_reviews.author: Merrill R. Mcalister

customer_reviews.title: Top no good
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers commented, dressing overflows the pour spout making a real mess. The bigger problem for me was that after 3 months, the pivot holes in the clear plastic top began to corrode and fall apart leaving the black top loose and leaky. It is in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: P. Collins

customer_reviews.title: doesn't leak
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to everyone for reviews, really helped with making a choice. Fan of OXO products and this one does not disappoint. The pour spout does not leak when shaking and cleans up well. Kind of wanted a bigger container for larger amount of dressing, but it is actually fine as I change the dressings up weekly anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for salad dressing for one!
customer_reviews.text: I love to make my salad dressings from scratch but all the other salad dressing makers are so large, it doesn't make sense for the little amount I make each week. This is perfect - about 4 servings of dressing so easy to use before it goes bad or you get bored!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K.

customer_reviews.title: L
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, nice to look at and leak proof. Has markings for ounces, up to 2 cups as well as metric measurements. I also have the smaller size and am very happy with them both.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Knutsen

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this salad dressing shaker. I have it in 2 colors to help me easily identify dressings. They have measurements marked and seal well for mixing. Easy to pour, east to store leftovers, and then easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: c j ray

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting.
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate that it opens at the wide part of the jar for adding ingredients and the the pour spout does indeed have a liquid-tigh leakproof seal meaning you can shake up your dressing with no worries. My only quibble, and it is a very minor one, is that some dressing accumulates above the stopper making the shaker requiring clean up to keep the shaker looking good. That said this salad dressing shaker is terrific. We make our own dressings and can keep a batch fresh and tasty over many nights.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making your own salad dressing
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with the two sizes I bought. One is smaller to take to restaurants or for lunches when working in an office. The large one is great for at home.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Salad dressing container
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for making homemade dressings. The top stays closed until you tilt the top back. You can store it in the fridge, and cupboard. It pours nicely too!
customer_reviews.author: Michele B

customer_reviews.title: These salad dressing shakers make it easy to mix directly in
customer_reviews.text: These salad dressing shakers make it easy to mix directly in, and the top is a really clever design. Some salad dressing shakers actually have a top that can be removed, the problem here though is that you wind up with oil somewhere other than your lettuce! This salad shaker prevents that unfortunate scenario and also keeps your thumbs from coming into contact with unnecessary oil. All said, it's a simply designed product and a great tool for anyone who is no longer punishing themselves with store bought salad dressing.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot better quality than what i expected. Its made from a good thick plastic that washed clean even after prolonged exposure to oils and dark balsamic pigment. It seals tight, no leaks even with vigurous shaking. It does not stain and its easy to clean (dishwasher safe). In the past with other similar products ive had a hard time thoroughly cleaning these and getting out all smells and spices from nooks and crannys. I have not had that problem with this product. Im very happy i bought this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Glittergirl25

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this salad dressing container. So easy to use and clean, just throw it in the dishwasher. There’s rubber around the stopper so it doesn’t leak. Only thing is I wish it was bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for salad dressing! They designed it really well so that dressing doesn’t leak or run over the lip. Much better than anything else I’ve used!
customer_reviews.author: Kubush

customer_reviews.title: Great for making your favorite salad dressing
customer_reviews.text: Love this salad dressing container. It contains measurement markers, perfect for mixing your salad, and its stop top is virtually drip proof. I received mine as a gift and have in turn gifted it to others on multiple occasions.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Makes preparing your own salad dressing EASY!
customer_reviews.text: Game changer for making home made salad dressing. Great quality and easy to use. I purchased the large and will also be purchasing the small. Get one, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Very messy
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to using this for our salad dressing. However it makes a big mess all over the bottle every time you poor out the dressing.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Harden

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips Salad Dressing Shaker Clear,Large,Black
product_meta.description: Size:Large| Color:BlackMake, mix, serve and store dressings, sauces and marinades with the OXO Good Grips Salad Dressing Shaker. The Shaker unscrews to reveal a wide opening that is ideal for adding a range of ingredients like oil, vinegar, mayonnaise, mustard, garlic, onions and spices. Cup, milliliter and ounce markings are printed on the sides for easy measurement of ingredients. Once ingredients are added, simply screw the top closed and shake to quickly mix dressings with no spills – the Shaker is watertight! The Shaker can also go straight to the table and is ideal for serving. Flip back the top lever to pour, and flip it forward to seal. The Shaker can then be used to store leftover dressing and sauce right inside the fridge. Made from Triton, the Shaker is dishwasher safe, highly durable and BPA free. It holds up to 1 1/2 cups and has measurement markings.
feature_bullets: Ideal for making, mixing, serving and storing dressings, sauces and marinades
Wide opening accommodates a range of ingredients
One-handed open/close lever flips back to pour and forward to seal
Made from Tritan, dishwasher safe, durable and BPA free

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,805 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
